Ghostly warriors can be accessed after completing the Spirit of Summer quest. These monsters are a variation of ghosts, so they count towards such on a Slayer task. Also, since ghostly warriors are undead, they are affected by the salve amulet and the salve amulet (e). If a player plans to fight them, it is recommended to bring High Level Alchemy runes, because of their common steel salvage drops, which alchemy for more than the runes are worth. They are also good droppers of cosmic, mind, and chaos runes.

Contents

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Requirements Spawns Map
Spirit Realm61None9Maplink

Getting there[edit | edit source]

To access them, the player must have completed the Spirit of Summer quest. In the magic axe hut in deep Wilderness, the player must wear Jennica's ring and operate it when standing right next to the portal to be taken to the Spirit Realm, where there will now be ghostly warriors in place of the magic axes.

The best way to access the portal is by using Wilderness levers in either Ardougne or Edgeville. The player will need a lockpick to access the hut. To leave, the player should just step into the portal and operate the ring again, or run away from the building.

As the Spirit Realm is classed as outside the Wilderness, all methods of teleportation can be used. However, entering the Spirit Realm via the portal is considered a teleport, so players cannot enter if a PKer has teleblocked them. It is also recommended that the player brings some food if planning to stay for a long period of time. Bringing extra food may be desirable because the location is in level 55 Wilderness; however, it is a short distance from the Wilderness lever teleport to the portal, although PKer attack is always possible.

This monster has access to the rare drop table.
Luck-enhancing items are not required to access the table, but they will increase the chance of accessing the rare drop table and may also improve the loot received from it.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • update 29 July 2008 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine of the warrior, "A spectral warrior with no axe", implies that their non-spiritual counterparts are magic axes.
  • Soon after the release of Spirit of Summer, it was possible to enter the hut without a lockpick; this has since been fixed.
  • Ghostly warriors appear to be a ghostly version of the old Varrock guards.
